text: was a Japanese entomologist specializing in Zygaenidae moths. During his career Inoue authored 148 species. ==References== == External links == * Data related to Hiroshi Inoue (ent.) at Wikispecies Category:1917 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Taxon authorities Category:Japanese entomologists Category:Japanese lepidopterists Category:20th-century zoologists
